text: [[b]]%+n[[/b]] embers from presence of Yellow turban factions
All [[b]]Yellow Turban factions[[/b]] apply their own share of embers.
Embers is shared between yellow turban factions and is gained in each their respective ways. It will diminish over time.
Embers decays over time and is lost further from military blunders. These failures are shared between all Yellow turban factions.
[[b]]HE YI[[/b]] - Earns embers from population size and by using occupy & aid wounded.\\n\\n[[b]]YELLOW TURBAN REBELLION FACTION[[/b]] - Earns embers from being alive. Protect them!

[[b]]GONG DU[[/b]] - Earns embers from on enemies slain and from constructing buildings from the "guerilla warfare" chain.\\n\\n[[b]]YELLOW TURBAN REBELLION FACTION[[/b]] - Earns embers from being alive. Protect them!
[[b]]HUANG SHAO[[/b]] - Earns embers from reforms.\\n\\n[[b]]YELLOW TURBAN REBELLION FACTION[[/b]] - Earns embers from being alive. Protect them!
